name: Hire Fulfillment Specialist
description: Hire a fulfillment specialist to manage order processing and shipping.

name: Inventory Tracking
description: Implement an inventory management system to track stock levels and prevent stockouts.
game_effect: Always see inventory counts (no manual audit required) and prevent workers from taking orders you don't have stock to fulfill.

name: Hire a Fabricator
description: Hire a fabricator to create custom products.

name: Discounted Shipping Rates
description: Negotiate discounted shipping rates with carriers to reduce shipping costs and increase profit margins.
game_effect: Decreases shipping costs by up to 88%! (but usually 50%!)

name: ShipSense AI
description: Automatically fill in shipping details based on historical data and machine learning.
game_effect: Eliminates a shipping step - inputting weights & dimensions!

name: Product Bundles
description: Bundle products together to increase average order value and offer discounts to customers.
game_effect: Increase your average order sales price by 50%!

name: Rate Shopper
description: Automatically compare shipping rates from multiple carriers to find the best rate for each shipment.
game_effect: Eliminates a shipping step - shopping for rates!

name: Order Grid Filters
description: Add filters to the order grid to quickly find and prioritize orders based on specific criteria.
game_effect: Ships orders who are expiring soon first, instead of picking by random.

name: Scan to Verify
description: Use a barcode scanner to verify that the correct items are being shipped.
game_effect: You won't lose products and cause customer issues (minigame)!

name: Purchase Orders
description: Create and manage purchase orders to keep track of inventory and costs.
game_effect: Prevents you from losing incoming parts for your widgets and having to run out and get some yourself (minigame).

name: Multi-Warehouse Support
description: Manage inventory across multiple warehouses to optimize shipping costs and delivery times.
game_effect: Because you have warehouses all over your shipping distances are much smaller on average.

name: Exclusive Logistics Network
description: Monopolize shipping routes and carriers,forcing your competitors to rely on pricier options.
game_effect: Increase shipping costs by 50% for every other active player.

name: Hostile Takeover
description: Acquire a competitor's business and integrate their operations into your own.
game_effect: Acquire a random player's business and exit them. Steal their orders shipped but pay out whatever their money was.

name: Advertising Campaign
description: Launch an advertising campaign to increase brand awareness and drive traffic to your store.
game_effect: Increase your order volume by 50% for 2 minutes.
